Mining Beam laser is strengthened to speed up terrain destruction.

Operates automatically once constructed within user's multi-tool inventory.
data.LASMINESPEED2_DESCRIPTION:
Mining Beam laser is strengthened to speed up terrain destruction.

Operates automatically once constructed within user's multi-tool inventory.
data.LASMINESPEED3_DESCRIPTION:
Mining Beam laser is strengthened to speed up terrain destruction.

Operates automatically once constructed within user's multi-tool inventory.
data.LASMINERAD1_DESCRIPTION:
Faster Mining Beam processes on resource-rich materials.

User will enjoy quicker element extraction from crystals, rocky outcrops and planetary vegetation.

Operates automatically once constructed within user's multi-tool inventory.
data.LASMINERAD2_DESCRIPTION:
Faster Mining Beam processes on resource-rich materials.

User will enjoy quicker element extraction from crystals, rocky outcrops and planetary vegetation.

Operates automatically once constructed within user's multi-tool inventory.
data.LASMINERAD3_DESCRIPTION:
Faster Mining Beam processes on resource-rich materials.

User will enjoy quicker element extraction from crystals, rocky outcrops and planetary vegetation.

Operates automatically once constructed within user's multi-tool inventory.
data.SHIPGUNRATE2_DESCRIPTION:
Photon Cannon fires at an increased rate.

Rapid fire modification that increases potential of damage, death and destruction on user's chosen targets.
 
Operates automatically once constructed within user's starship inventory.
data.SHIPGDMG1_DESCRIPTION:
Photon Cannon fires at an increased rate.
 
Operates automatically once constructed within user's starship inventory.
data.SHIPLDMG1_DESCRIPTION:
Phase Beam destroys starship and asteroid targets at an increased rate. 

Operates automatically once constructed within user's starship inventory.
data.SHIPSHIELDBOOST1_DESCRIPTION:
Starship energy shield is strengthened.

Provides added protection from laser fire, in-flight projectiles and accidental space debris interaction.

Operates automatically once constructed within user's starship inventory.
data.HOT2_DESCRIPTION:
Provides increased protection from extreme heat damage on scorched worlds. 

Device is charged by <EARTH>mineral extracts<> found in hot environments. Operates automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.
data.STAM2_DESCRIPTION:
Increases user's ability to run for extended periods.

Can be used alongside other Stamina Enhancement upgrades.

Operates automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.
data.TOX2_DESCRIPTION:
Provides increased protection from toxic rain damage. 

Device is charged by <EARTH>mineral extracts<> found in toxic environments. Operates automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.
data.UNW2_DESCRIPTION:
Provides an increased ability to swim underwater for extended periods.

Can be used alongside other Aeration Membrane upgrades.

Device is charged directly by <FUEL>Oxygen<>. Operates automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.
data.RAD2_DESCRIPTION:
Provides user with increased protection from radiation damage.

Device is charged by <EARTH>mineral extracts<> found in radioactive environments. Operates automatically once constructed within user's exosuit inventory.
data.ARMOUR1_DESCRIPTION:
Increases user's health once primary systems have failed.

Automatically consumed when Life Support, Shield and Hazard Protection systems are offline.
data.ENERGYBOOST1_DESCRIPTION:
Increases available energy within user's Life Support systems.

Allows for extended periods of planetary exploration.
data.SHIPLASCOOL1_DESCRIPTION:
Phase beam laser cool-down times are significantly reduced.

Operates automatically once constructed within user's starship inventory.
data.SHIPJUMP2_DESCRIPTION: Provides increased manoeuvrability and longer boosts during spaceflight.
data.PROTECT_DESCRIPTION:
The Exosuit's <CATALYST>Hazard Protection<> system continually monitors and stabilises the user's environment. 

General reactive protection may be augmented with <TECHNOLOGY>Environmental Shields<>, offering increased protection against specific conditions.

The device is charged with <CATALYST>sodium-based substances<>. User is advised that a failure to charge the Hazard Protection system may allow their environment to become incompatible with life.
data.LAUNCHER_DESCRIPTION: Vital launch and landing gear system. User is advised that specialised, Deuterium-derived fuel is required to recharge thruster. Launch procedures require sufficient fuel levels before activation. Hold THRUST<> to take off from planet. Hold BOOST<> to initiate in-flight speed boost.
data.GRENDMG_DESCRIPTION:
Plasma Launcher grenades cause heightened damage within their localised zone of impact.

Operates automatically once constructed within user's multi-tool inventory.
data.BLACKH_TECH_DESCRIPTION:
Starship is shielded from the gravitational intensity endured when passing through a Black Hole.

Operates automatically once user's starship passes through the event horizon.
data.BLACKH_TECH_DESCRIPTION_ALT:
Starship is shielded from the gravitational intensity endured when passing through a Black Hole.

Operates automatically once user's starship passes through the event horizon. Shielding is damaged and consumed by each Black Hole transit, and must be replaced.
data.DELICACY1_DESCRIPTION:
Edible product much beloved by the Gek.
 
Allows beaked traders to release delightfully scented packets of gas for a prolonged period of time.
 
GekNip gas packets are considered an art form, and the truest representation of the Gek soul.
data.DELICACY2_DESCRIPTION:
Gas inhaled by Vy'keen warriors to temporarily increase lung capacity and allow high quality battle screams.
 
Outlawed by many peace agreements throughout the galaxy, many of which are now broken.
data.COMMODITY1_DESCRIPTION:
A lightweight metal product heavily used in ship part manufacture.
 
Also used in the construction of planetside outposts and facilities of all known primary species.
data.COMMODITY2_DESCRIPTION:
Naturally glowing crystalline clusters.
 
Used in the creation of technological devices and starship manufacture.
data.COMMODITY3_DESCRIPTION:
Non-reactive and pressure-resistant liquid.
 
Vital to the manufacture of starship and exosuit technologies.
data.COMMODITY4_DESCRIPTION:
Multi-purpose conductive material.
 
Extremely versatile and used throughout the galaxy in exosuit, multi-tool and starship technologies.
data.PROD_FUEL1_DESCRIPTION:
Convenient and optimised power storage unit. Used in a wide variety of weapon and life support systems
 
Easily constructed from common isotopes, and frequently found in cylindrical metal containers.
data.SHIELDFUEL1_DESCRIPTION:
Hazard Protection and Shield energy storage unit.
 
Easily constructed from common oxides, and often stored in yellow crates.
data.HACK1_DESCRIPTION:
A single use device that can be used to gain access to encrypted terminals and facilities.
 
Commonly used to hijack Landing Pad facilities at alien outposts. Perhaps illegal.
data.PROD_FUEL2_DESCRIPTION:
Increased capacity power gel source.
 
Promotes efficient power storage within exosuit and starship inventories.
 
Used in a wide variety of weapon and life support systems.
data.PROD_FUEL3_DESCRIPTION:
High capacity power gel source.
 
A hugely efficient device that optimises power storage within exosuit and starship inventories.
 
Used in a wide variety of weapon and life support systems.
data.SHIELDFUEL2_DESCRIPTION:
Increased capacity energy storage unit.
 
Promotes efficient energy storage within exosuit and starship inventories.
 
Used in Hazard Protection and Shield systems.
data.SHIELDFUEL3_DESCRIPTION:
High capacity energy storage unit.
 
A hugely efficient device that optimises energy storage within suit and ship inventories.
 
Used in Hazard Protection and Shield systems.
data.COMMODITY5_DESCRIPTION:
Captured cloud of ionised electrons.
 
A fundamental component of many technologies, and often used in the creation of antimatter.
data.COMMODITY6_DESCRIPTION:
Contained negative matter and baryogenesis antiparticles.
 
The vast energy potential of antimatter makes it highly valuable. 95% of existing antimatter consumption is in the powering of <TECHNOLOGY>starship hyperdrives<>.

<FUEL>WARNING<>: uncontained usage is not recommended.
data.COMMODITY7_DESCRIPTION:
Electromagnetic frequency oscillator.
 
A device necessary in the construction of many of the technologies that aid in the exploration of the galaxy.
data.CURIO1_DESCRIPTION:
A metal statuette of a creature with a coin placed in its beak.
 
Popular with many traders who see it as an emblem of fair commerce and peace.
data.CURIO2_DESCRIPTION:
A small wooden icon carved into the shape of a Sentinel drone.
 
Used by warriors to enter a temporary trance-like state that eliminates their kind's need for sleep.
data.CURIO3_DESCRIPTION:
The metallic shell of a disconnected electronic lifeform that was too distant from its kind to be refreshed with a new entity.
 
Highly prized by all species, not least its own.
data.CURIO4_DESCRIPTION:
A spherical gem that seems to pulsate with red light from its centre.
 
An extremely rare item often associated with ancient monolithic sites.
data.ACCESS1_DESCRIPTION:
Security and permissions pass granted to specific travellers by many primary galactic species.

Provides access to low level restricted areas and outpost systems.
data.ACCESS2_DESCRIPTION:
Security and permissions pass granted to specific travellers by many primary galactic species.
 
Provides access to mid-tier restricted areas and outpost systems.
data.ACCESS3_DESCRIPTION:
Security and permissions pass granted to specific travellers by many primary galactic species.
 
Provides access to high level restricted areas and outpost systems.
data.DELICACY3_DESCRIPTION:
Golden metal sphere used to temporarily increase the processing power of electronic lifeforms.
 
Conductivity within an entity's casing is dramatically increased, resulting in faster analysis and research.
data.ALLOY1_DESCRIPTION:
A lightweight and highly malleable alloy.
 
In high demand on the Galactic Trade Network due to its utility in the construction of planetside outposts and facilities.
data.ALLOY2_DESCRIPTION:
Combined neutral alloy with uses that range from pharmacology all the way to heavy industry.
 
Forms the backbone of galactic alloy trading.
data.ALLOY3_DESCRIPTION:
Heavy metal alloy.
 
Used extensively in starship freighter construction due to its sheer strength. A hardcore material popular on the Galactic Trade Network.
data.ALLOY4_DESCRIPTION:
Highly resistant and durable alloy primarily used in starship hull construction and deep-space exploration drone technology.
 
The crolium trading market is a strong force within the overall Galactic Trading Network.
data.ALLOY5_DESCRIPTION:
Highly prized and lustrous alloy. Popular with traders of all known primary galactic races.
 
Easily recognisable by its bright red glow and strong magnetic field.
data.ALLOY6_DESCRIPTION:
Soft workable alloy favoured by artisans throughout the known galaxy.
 
A popular trading good, with many galactic shipping paths devoted to its sale and transport.
data.ALLOY7_DESCRIPTION:
Light metal alloy traded throughout the galactic Outer Edge.
 
Often used in the interiors of trading shuttles to reduce weight as they ascend from planets with high gravitational fields.
data.PULSEFUEL1_DESCRIPTION:
Charged radioactive isotope core.
 
Used to recharge Pulse Engines in a wide variety of starships and freighter vessels.
data.HYPERFUEL1_DESCRIPTION:
This <FUEL>antimatter-based fuel<> is one of the few power sources capable of meeting the incredible energy requirements of a <TECHNOLOGY>starship hyperdrive<>.

Secured within a robust housing, the cell is guarenteed paradox-free during FTL travel.
data.GRENFUEL1_DESCRIPTION:
Densely-packed fuel capsule for use in the <TECHNOLOGY>Plasma Launcher<>.
 
Contained highly-pressurised electro-thermal energy for use in land disruption grenade technology.
data.NEWPROD1_DESC: Good luck charm carried by many galactic traders.
data.NEWPROD2_DESC: Largely ceremonial weapon. A vital part of Vy'keen tradition and culture.
data.NEWPROD3_DESC: Device used by the Korvax for the storage of historical and cultural information.
data.NEWPROD5_DESC: Valuable computer part. A much favoured trading item.
data.NEWPROD6_DESC: Sought-after device, commonly seen on the galactic trading market.
data.NEWPROD7_DESC: Important substance used in scientific research and experimentation.
data.NEWPROD10_DESC:
Extremely valuable curiosity can sometimes be found in the seas and lakes of some planetary systems.

Their initial origin is unknown.
data.NEWPROD11_DESC:
Dense metal objects that, long ago, materialised within subterranean networks throughout the Galaxy.

Extremely rare, and of high value.
data.NEWPROD12_DESC:
Stabilised poison sample initially produced by aquatic urchin creatures.

A rare and expensive item on the Galactic Trade Network.
data.NEWPROD13_DESC:
Supersymmetric particle cluster.

Extremely rare and valuable. A product of divergent super-gravitational forces.
data.NEWPROD14_DESC:
Gemstone formed over the course of centuries within the egg of a super-incubatory species.

Extremely rare.
data.ATLAS_SEED_10_DESC: An Atlas Seed containing a time-locked quantum cilia suspended in a photonic shell. No others are known to exist.
data.ATLAS_SEED_1_DESC: Atlas Seed containing zonally-shifted quasi-stellar substrate. Warning: do not allow matrix to commune with this dimensional space.
data.ATLAS_SEED_6_DESC: This irreplaceable Atlas Seed is a form of matter-adapted photons coalesced into physical solidity by unknown means.
data.ATLAS_SEED_4_DESC: An Atlas Seed shell encompassing a void element harvested from the collapse state of the last universe. Toxic if ingested.
data.ATLAS_SEED_9_DESC: This one-of-a-kind Atlas Seed holds an aesthetically pleasing mathematical construct salvaged from the simulation of an alternate reality.
data.ATLAS_SEED_3_DESC: An Atlas Seed capable of resonating on humanoid telepathic frequencies; may attempt to subsume any subordinate intellect in close proximity.
data.ATLAS_SEED_7_DESC: For unknown reasons, this unique Atlas Seed has been phased out of alignment with this quantum reality. Contents cannot be determined.
data.ATLAS_SEED_8_DESC: Atlas Seed contains neutronium elements from a catastrophic supernova event that obliterated a sentient civilization in an earlier era.
data.ATLAS_SEED_5_DESC: Sculpted tau neutrino-boson matrix fixed within an irreplaceable Atlas Seed shell. May be semi-sentient.
data.ATLAS_SEED_2_DESC: This Atlas Shell holds the remains of a parasitic space-borne lifeform, most likely of extra-dimensional origins.
data.RESTART_ITEM_DESC: Everything you ever knew is within.
data.STARBIRTH_ITEM_DESC:
The smallest of sparks, housed within a containment field of unknown origins.

The seed glows with life, desperate to escape and fulfill its potential.
data.OSD_EXP_PLAYER_RANK_IMPROVED: New Korvax Rank: Point of Interest
data.OSD_EXP_PLAYER_RANK_HIGHEST3: New Korvax Rank: Traveller of the Atlas
data.TRA_REQUEST_LANG_1_OLD: Friend! The Gek Trade Federation are open to your questions and requests! Speak! Speak!
data.EXP_REQUEST_LANG_1_OLD: Fascinating. The unknown creature has probable requests for help. The Korvax Convergence awaits illumination.
data.WAR_REQUEST_LANG_1_OLD: Grah! Interloper! Vy'keen High Command request warriors hear your pathetic requests!
data.TRA_REQUEST_DESC_1: The trader looks at me with boggle-eyed curiosity. They click their beak a few times, emit a neutral-scent, and wait for my request.
data.TRA_REQUEST_DESC_2: The Trader indicates that they are open for conversation with a click of their beak and a sweet-smelling gas emission.
data.TRA_REQUEST_DESC_3:
The Trader stares into my visor and clicks their beak in time with my breathing.
 
I can only assume that this is supposed to make me feel welcome.
data.TRA_REQUEST_DESC_4: The Trader's frantic beak-clicking seems to indicate that they are open to some stilted conversation and potential miscommunication.
data.TRA_REQUEST_DESC_5:
The Trader is clicking their beak and drooling slightly. 
When the drool is about to hit the hem of their suit, they somehow manage to snort it back through their nasal holes, creating an impressive (if temporary) phlegm-loop.
data.TRA_REQUEST_DESC_6: The scent of the Trader is as pleasant as it is intoxicating. There is pride in their eyes, perhaps as a result of the flowery gas that has engulfed both us and the entire facility.
data.TRA_REQUEST_DESC_7: The Trader clicks their beak with heightened energy. They stare at my exosuit and Multi-Tool, presumably wondering why I want to talk.
data.TRA_REQUEST_DESC_8: The Trader recently emitted a sweet-smelling gas. As the scent filters through my breathing apparatus, I wonder at the extra sales this odd evolution in communication must haved secured for this strange species.
data.TRA_REQUEST_DESC_9:
The Trader wants to make itself understood. They click their beak slowly and nods their head encouragingly.
 
A small line of drool glistens in the rays cast by the facility's lighting apparatus.
data.TRA_REQUEST_DESC_10: The Trader had been eyeing me covertly and holding its breath, but now that I'm engaging them in conversation they becomes more animated.
data.TRA_REQUEST_DESC_11:
A faintly unpleasant smell swiftly fades.
 
The Trader pecks my multi-tool, leaving a faint trace of drool, and it's made clear that they are open to conversation.
data.TRA_REQUEST_DESC_12:
The scent of the Trader is as pleasant as it is intoxicating. 
 
There is pride in their eyes, perhaps as a result of the flowery gas that has engulfed both us and the entire facility.
data.EXP_REQUEST_DESC_1:
The electronic lifeform pauses their work, looks up, and focuses their mask lights on my visor.

They wait for my request, but they seem desperate to get back to their vital research.
data.EXP_REQUEST_DESC_2:
The electronic lifeform looks up at me with interest. Their facial lights constrict as they stare deep into my visor.
 
I can't help but feel that countless analytical systems are recording and studying every move I make.
data.EXP_REQUEST_DESC_3:
The lights in the electronic lifeform's mask casing seem to constrict.
 
They tilt their head slightly as they chitters at me, perhaps wondering what it is that I want.
data.EXP_REQUEST_DESC_4:
The electronic lifeform looks at my biological frame with something approaching pity. Not for the first time, I wonder what lies beneath the entity's mask.
 
Perhaps, long ago, this species was not so different from my own...
data.EXP_REQUEST_DESC_5:
The lights in the electronic lifeform's casing start to brighten. They jerk their head sharply to the right, a strange buzzing noise signalling an on-rush of unseen data.
 
The download over, they downgrade their communication channels to those of conventional speech...
data.EXP_REQUEST_DESC_6:
The lights in the lifeform's casing are wide and dim, but as they turn to talk their mask becomes momentarily blank. They swiftly come back online, but I can't help but feel that their piercing gaze is that of a different entity altogether.
 
Nonetheless, they seem keen to communicate.
data.EXP_REQUEST_DESC_7:
A multitude of processes appear to be working within the electronic lifeform. There's one however, a very simple and inelegant one, that's devoted to conversing with creatures of low intelligence.
 
Right now, a fraction of that process seems to be directed at me.
data.EXP_REQUEST_DESC_8:
The casing lights in the electronic lifeform's mask shine brightly. As they lean towards me, a bright flash burns into my retinas.
 
As the after-image subsides, the entity makes it clear that they are ready to converse with me.
data.EXP_REQUEST_DESC_9:
The electronic lifeform speaks slowly, calmly and considerately. Their casing lights flash.
 
Despite their vast intellect, they clearly haven't been able to predict what I want from them...
data.EXP_REQUEST_DESC_10: My presence has made the lifeform somewhat curious. They buzz faintly to indicate that they are open to non-electronic communication.
data.EXP_REQUEST_DESC_11: I feel the bright piercing gaze of the electronic lifeform. They seem extremely interested in what I have to say.
data.EXP_REQUEST_DESC_12:
The lights in the electronic lifeform's casing start to brighten. They jerk their head sharply to the right, a strange buzzing noise signalling an on-rush of unseen data.
 
The download over, they downgrade their communication channels to those of conventional speech...
data.WAR_REQUEST_DESC_1:
The warrior's hackles rise, and they start to shake in anticipation of my request.

I sense that their ancestors are likely to be offended if I push the issue too far...
data.WAR_REQUEST_DESC_2:
The warrior's movements indicate that their ancestors are not currently insulted.
 
They make friendly barking noises.
data.WAR_REQUEST_DESC_3:
The warrior seems less aggressive than I might expect.
 
Their lips curl over their teeth as they taste my scent.
data.WAR_REQUEST_DESC_4:
The warrior indicates that they have no current desire to kill me.
 
Their lips curl over their teeth a they deliver a series of elegantly formed barking noises.
data.WAR_REQUEST_DESC_5:
The warrior is making snarling noises that sound strangely upbeat.
 
They do not seem intent on violence. Right now.
data.WAR_REQUEST_DESC_6: The warrior's barks have a welcoming tone. My exosuit's auditory sensors automatically turn down the relay volume.
data.WAR_REQUEST_DESC_7: The lifeform seems open to conversation, and their ancestors are currently not offended by my presence or the opinions I hold.
data.WAR_REQUEST_DESC_8:
The warrior stares at me, as if in anticipation of a grave insult to their ancestry.
 
I'm about to back away when their face turns. They deliver a sequence of amused yelps at my hesitation, before indicating that they are open to further conversation.
data.WAR_REQUEST_DESC_9:
The warrior shivers in anticipation before confronting me. They bark savagely, showing yellowed canines and a bloodied tongue.
 
As soon as the fury begins, however, it seems to be over. The lifeform nods solemnly, and indicates that they will hear my plea.
data.WAR_REQUEST_DESC_10:
The warrior looks as if they could glory in their ancestry at any given moment.
 
Before they do so, however, they makes it clear that they are also willing to talk to me.
data.WAR_REQUEST_DESC_11: The warrior looks as if they might want something dead. Thankfully, right now, it doesn't feel like that's me...
data.WAR_REQUEST_DESC_12:
The warrior seems less aggressive than I might expect.
 
Their lips curl over their teeth as they taste my scent.
data.DNT_TRA_REQUEST_LANG_1: Always trade with the Gek! The peaceful, benevolent Gek!
data.DNT_TRA_REQUEST_LANG_2: Gek worker can strengthen friend relations! Your request?
data.DNT_TRA_REQUEST_LANG_3: Can a Gek Trade Federation representative help you, friend?
data.DNT_TRA_REQUEST_LANG_4: Trading friend demand immediate attention! SalesGek help?
data.DNT_TRA_REQUEST_LANG_5: How can the Gek Trade Federation help you today?
data.DNT_TRA_REQUEST_LANG_6: Gek Trade Federation is peaceful and loving! Please buy things!
data.DNT_TRA_REQUEST_LANG_7: Always trade with the Gek! The peaceful, benevolent Gek!
data.DNT_TRA_REQUEST_LANG_8: Friend! Gek Trading Federation hopes you enjoy this planet!
data.DNT_TRA_REQUEST_LANG_9: Gek worker has admired your mining skills from afar!
data.DNT_TRA_REQUEST_LANG_10: Gek scent is alluring! A pleasure! A pleasure to converse!
data.DNT_TRA_REQUEST_LANG_11: SalesGek duty to respond to customer queries!
data.DNT_TRA_REQUEST_LANG_12: Yes. What? Gek on lunch break now.
data.DNT_WAR_REQUEST_LANG_1: Vy'keen High Command insist warrior help pathetic interloper coward. Your question?
data.DNT_WAR_REQUEST_LANG_2: Vy'keen warrior help pathetic, weak-minded interloper today?
data.DNT_WAR_REQUEST_LANG_3: Hail pathetic, weak-minded interloper. I serve requests with honour.
data.DNT_WAR_REQUEST_LANG_4: Interloper avoids offending Vy'keen ancestors today. Good news.
data.DNT_WAR_REQUEST_LANG_5: War alert high. Enemy species will suffer. Interloper species... currently acceptable.
data.DNT_WAR_REQUEST_LANG_6: Vy'keen High Command insist warrior help pathetic interloper coward. Your question?
data.DNT_WAR_REQUEST_LANG_8: Interloper ally! War preparation is high, peace ends soon!
data.DNT_WAR_REQUEST_LANG_9: Interloper blood and Vy'keen blood run together. Glorious alliance!
data.DNT_WAR_REQUEST_LANG_10: Holy ancestors smile on the interloper.
data.DNT_WAR_REQUEST_LANG_11: Vy'keen warrior dislike pathetic, weak-minded coward species. Interloper species... almost acceptable.
data.DNT_WAR_REQUEST_LANG_12: Death! Death! Death! Death! Death! Joyful warrior!

data.DNT_EXP_REQUEST_LANG_10: Korvax Convergence adores fascinating traveller. New Korvax research topic!

data.DEATH_QUOTE_1:
THE GODS DO NOT PROTECT FOOLS.
FOOLS ARE PROTECTED BY MORE CAPABLE FOOLS.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_2:
THE ONLY WAY OF DISCOVERING THE LIMITS 
OF THE POSSIBLE IS TO VENTURE A LITTLE WAY 
PAST THEM INTO THE IMPOSSIBLE.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_3:
I MAY NOT HAVE GONE WHERE I INTENDED TO GO, 
BUT I THINK I HAVE ENDED UP WHERE I NEEDED TO BE.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_4: IN SUCH SECONDS OF DECISION ENTIRE FUTURES ARE MADE.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_5:
THE SUPREME IRONY OF LIFE IS THAT HARDLY 
ANYONE GETS OUT OF IT ALIVE.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_7: WE ARE AN IMPOSSIBILITY IN AN IMPOSSIBLE UNIVERSE.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_8:
LIFE IS PLEASANT. DEATH IS PEACEFUL.
IT'S THE TRANSITION THAT'S TROUBLESOME.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_9: REALITY IS THAT WHICH, WHEN YOU STOP BELIEVING IN IT, DOESN'T GO AWAY.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_10:
THE MYSTERY OF LIFE ISN'T A PROBLEM TO SOLVE,
BUT A REALITY TO EXPERIENCE.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_11:
TO APPRECIATE THE WONDER OF THE UNIVERSE, 
ONE MUST FIRST REMAIN ALIVE.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_12:
I TELL YOU, WE ARE HERE ON EARTH TO FART AROUND,
AND DON'T LET ANYBODY TELL YOU DIFFERENT.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_13:
WE LIVE ON A PLACID ISLAND OF IGNORANCE IN THE MIDST 
OF BLACK SEAS OF INFINITY, AND IT WAS NOT MEANT THAT 
WE SHOULD VOYAGE FAR.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_14:
A STAR HAS DIED. ELSEWHERE IN THE COSMOS, 
IN AN UNREMARKABLE CORNER OF ONE GALACTIC ARM, 
A CHILD WAS BORN. SUCH IS THE BALANCE OF EXISTENCE.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_15:
I SEE THE BLACKNESS. WORSE THAN SPACE, 
WORSE THAN ANYTHING. UTTERLY BLACK, 
AND IT SWALLOWS ME WHOLE.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_16:
LOOKING AT THESE STARS SUDDENLY DWARFED 
MY OWN TROUBLES AND ALL THE GRAVITIES OF 
TERRESTRIAL LIFE...
data.DEATH_QUOTE_17:
THERE'S A DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE FACT THAT THE 
UNIVERSE IS INHERENTLY UNFAIR ON A COSMIC LEVEL, 
AND THE FACT THAT LIFE IS UNFAIR BECAUSE PEOPLE 
ARE ACTIVELY MAKING IT SO.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_18: SO MUCH UNIVERSE, AND SO LITTLE TIME.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_19:
I GUESS YOU COULD CALL IT A 'FAILURE', 
BUT I PREFER THE TERM 'LEARNING EXPERIENCE'.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_20: I BELIEVE THAT LIFE IS A GAME, THAT LIFE IS A CRUEL JOKE.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_21:
THERE IS NO SUCH THING AS SCIENCE FICTION, 
THERE IS ONLY SCIENCE EVENTUALITY.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_22: ETERNITY IS A LONG TIME, ESPECIALLY TOWARDS THE END.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_23:
TWO THINGS ARE INFINITE: THE UNIVERSE AND HUMAN 
STUPIDITY; AND I'M NOT SURE ABOUT THE UNIVERSE.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_24:
THERE SEEMS TO BE MORE TO THE UNIVERSE THAN 
RANDOM, CHAOTIC, PURPOSELESS MOVEMENT OF A 
COLLECTION OF MOLECULAR PARTICLES.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_25:
WE'D STARED INTO THE FACE OF DEATH, 
AND DEATH BLINKED FIRST.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_26:
STABILITY IS THE BEGINNING OF THE END. WE ONLY 
WALK BY CONTINUALLY BEGINNING TO FALL FORWARD.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_27:
EVEN WHEN THE WORLD THROWS ITS WORST AND 
THEN TURNS ITS BACK, THERE IS STILL ALWAYS HOPE.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_28: REALITY IS SHAPED BY THE FORCES THAT DESTROY IT.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_29: WE WALK IN DARK PLACES NO OTHERS WILL ENTER.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_30:
IF YOU'RE GOING TO DO SOMETHING THAT CRAZY, 
SAVE IT FOR WHEN IT'LL MAKE A DIFFERENCE.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_31:
POLLUTED BY CRIMES, AND TORN BY THE BITTEREST 
REMORSE, WHERE CAN I FIND REST BUT IN DEATH?
data.DEATH_QUOTE_32:
HERE LIES ONE FROM A DISTANT STAR, BUT THE SOIL IS 
NOT ALIEN TO HIM, FOR IN DEATH HE BELONGS TO THE UNIVERSE.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_33:
WE THINK EVERYTHING IN THIS UNIVERSE HAS TO CONFORM 
TO OUR PARADIGM OF WHAT MAKES SENSE.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_34: SOMEWHERE, SOMETHING INCREDIBLE IS WAITING TO BE KNOWN.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_35: SOMETIMES I THINK I MUST HAVE A GUARDIAN IDIOT.
data.DEATH_QUOTE_36:
WE'RE EACH OF US ALONE, TO BE SURE. WHAT CAN YOU 
DO BUT HOLD YOUR HAND OUT IN THE DARK?
data.DEATH_AUTHOR_3:
- DOUGLAS ADAMS, 
THE LONG DARK TEA-TIME OF THE SOUL
data.DEATH_AUTHOR_6: - IAIN M. BANKS, THE PLAYER OF GAMES
data.DEATH_AUTHOR_9:
- PHILIP K. DICK,
I HOPE I SHALL ARRIVE SOON
data.DEATH_AUTHOR_12: - KURT VONNEUGT, A MAN WITHOUT A COUNTRY
data.DEATH_AUTHOR_13: - H.P. LOVECRAFT, THE CALL OF CTHULHU
data.DEATH_AUTHOR_27: - PITTACUS LORE, THE POWER OF SIX
data.DEATH_AUTHOR_28: - D. HARLAN WILSON, THE KYOTO MAN
data.DEATH_AUTHOR_36:
- URSULA K. LE GUIN,
THE UNREAL AND THE REAL VOLUME 2
